resources.ht_maxItems: Maximum amount of items that will be displayed on RVP
resources.ht_itemsPerRowLargeDesktop: Amount of items shown per row on large desktops
resources.ht_itemsPerRowDesktop: Amount of items shown per row on regular desktops
resources.ht_itemsPerRowTablet: Amount of items shown per row on tablets
resources.ht_itemsPerRowMobile: Amount of items shown per row on mobile devices
